img.alt: OUR MISSION - Our mission is to provide a rigorous and differentiated academic program strengthened by a broad musical arts curriculum, enabling students to become college and career ready critical thinkers, lifelong learners, and positive contributors to society.

div.p: Our mission is to provide a rigorous and differentiated academic program strengthened by a broad musical arts curriculum, enabling students to become college and career ready critical thinkers, lifelong learners, and positive contributors to society.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-collage combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left

img.alt: OUR VISION - It is the vision of ENCORE Academy to build and sustain a school where all students individual academic needs are met through research-based programming executed through effective and differentiated instructional delivery practices by knowledgeable and compassionate teachers.

p.strong: It is the vision of ENCORE Academy to build and sustain a school where all students individual academic needs are met through research-based programming executed through effective and differentiated instructional delivery practices by knowledgeable and compassionate teachers.
